title: Implement set of build status from jenkins to bitbucket

content.raw:
The goal is to be able to set different build statuses on bitbucket commits directly from Jenkins. A quick roadmap:

 * Set the build status as 'in progress' when the build is triggered.
    *  #!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/194

 * ~~Implement the modification (a different method if you look at the API) status to set 'success' or 'fail' when the build is finished~~ This was not true. we can use the implementation in pull request 194 to modify statuses.

 * Figure out how to add the corresponding DSL code to run the modification code in the right place (after the build).

  • Implement the modification (a different method if you look at the API) status to set 'success' or 'fail' when the build is finished This was not true. we can use the implementation in pull request 194 to modify statuses.
